DOC.brief_title: Islet Transplantation Patients With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: We test whether pancreatic islet isolate cadaveric human donor pancreata transplant portal vein patient T1DM stable renal allograft achieve insulin independence recipient . The protocol employ define islet isolation procedure , percutaneous islet infusion recipient 's portal vein via intra-portal catheter , tight glycemic control peri-transplant period , immunosuppressive protocol avoids glucocorticoid .
